about_the_game:
Overview

Master the three weapons that change according to the humanoid robot form and fighter form, destroy the scattered enemy attack targets, and finally defeat the boss standing in your way!

Story

The planet EARTHENTIA, a star system in a faraway galaxy, has prospered by building numerous colonial space colonies and expanding its living sphere into outer space.
Conflict with the colony government over the resource satellite "EN-175" discovered during planetary exploration, and the unmanned weapons group that became a negative legacy in the war evolved and suddenly turned against humanity and became an enemy of humanity. came to be called "Thanatos" (Death), and stood up to destroy it with two state-of-the-art weapons VFA and all military strength.

points

・Gamepad support

・ Omni-directional free scroll stg

that can scroll in any direction of the player

・Combine the power and performance of 3D with the simple operability of 2D

・Exhilarating game balance with high-speed development

・7 stages in total

・Two unique types of operable aircraft
detailed_description:
Overview

Master the three weapons that change according to the humanoid robot form and fighter form, destroy the scattered enemy attack targets, and finally defeat the boss standing in your way!

Story

The planet EARTHENTIA, a star system in a faraway galaxy, has prospered by building numerous colonial space colonies and expanding its living sphere into outer space.
Conflict with the colony government over the resource satellite "EN-175" discovered during planetary exploration, and the unmanned weapons group that became a negative legacy in the war evolved and suddenly turned against humanity and became an enemy of humanity. came to be called "Thanatos" (Death), and stood up to destroy it with two state-of-the-art weapons VFA and all military strength.

points

・Gamepad support

・ Omni-directional free scroll stg

that can scroll in any direction of the player

・Combine the power and performance of 3D with the simple operability of 2D

・Exhilarating game balance with high-speed development

・7 stages in total

・Two unique types of operable aircraft
name: RAGINGSTRIKE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Graphics Chip
